org.mule.munit.common.mocking
Class MessageProcessorMocker

java.lang.Object
  org.mule.munit.common.mocking.MunitMockingTool
      org.mule.munit.common.mocking.MessageProcessorMocker

public class MessageProcessorMocker
extends MunitMockingTool

This class is a Munit Tool to create Message processor mocks

Usage:

new MessageProcessorMocker(muleContext).when("mp").ofNamespace("namespace").thenReturn(muleMessage);

Constructor Summary

           Determines that the mocked message processor must return the same event as before its call.
